name: Kite (itch) (Ermolli)
description:
After a tragic event, all the objects of the universe have been scattered throughout the cosmos. Now we need the help of our protagonist and their dragon-kite to get them back. How To Play

Cosmos. 

Fly towards smaller items to eat them. 

Avoid larger objects. 

Eat and Grow! 

Controls: 

  • WASD/Arrows  -  Move
  • Mouse  -  Look Around

Island. 

In the island you can see all the items you have collected.

Controls: 

  • WASD/Arrows  -  Move
  • X  -  Pickup and Drop Items

Credits

Guillermo Filipiak

Mattia Ermolli
